name: Terranova (itch)
description:
Terranova is a school project that I've created throughout this year. 

It's a puzzle game, you have to rotate certain igloos to create a path for the penguin to reach the end of the level. 

I'm currently  a student Game Design from Luca School of Arts located in Genk (Belgium).

If you enjoyed this game feel free to give me some feedback, I'm not the best programmer though. 

If you like this project and want to help to make it better,  contact me at beauva@hotmail.be.

My regards and enjoy the game!
Beau Vankemenade
